entry.g:title: SARK100 1-60MHz HF ANT SWR Antenna Analyzer Meter Standing Wave Tester for Ham Radio Hobbyists Impedance Capacitance
entry.g:description:
Handytool SARK100 1-60MHz HF ANT SWR Antenna Analyzer Meter Standing Wave Tester for Ham Radio Hobbyists Impedance Capacitance Measurement This is an antenna analyzer for ham radio hobbyists. It can measure 50 ohms source impedance with the error of (+/-)1 ohm. It is also a meter for standing wave, impedance, capacitance...
Features: Frequency generation & control: 1-60MHz. External power: 2.1mm power jack(center pin positive). 5 operation buttons, easy and convenient to operate. Installed black metal case, just connect the power(not included) and then work. Step size: user configurable increments of 100Hz, 1KHz, 10KHz, and 100KHz. Support measuring data waveform analysis via connecting computer with USB cable(not included). Applications: Measure antenna electrical parameters: SWR, impedance(resistance+reactance), capacitance, inductance; Measure feed point impedance; Measure ground loss; Adjust antenna tuners and determine loss; Measure inductors and capacitors; Measure coax transmission line(SWR, length, velocity factor, approximate Q and loss, resonant frequency, and impedance); Measure and determine optimum settings for tuning stubs: SWR, approximate Q, resonant frequency, bandwidth, impedance; Determine characteristic impedance of transmission line; Measure magnetic loop resonance and SWR; Operation Buttons Definitions: MODE: select operation mode: impedance(default), complex impedance, capacitance, and inducatance BAND: select band from any of the available bands: 160M to 6M CONFIG: provide menu for configurations and extended functions: PC Link, step size setting, suspend timeout setting, calibration, and software upgrade SCAN: press this control to initiates a scan of frequencies of the selected BAND. Scan exits to impedance mode showing the 2:1 bandwidth and the resonant point o the antenna CAN(up): increase frequency and used to cancel operation for CONFIG menu VAL(down): decrease frequency and used to validate operation for CONFIG menu
Specifications: Frequency Generation & Control: 1-60MHz Source Impedance: 50 ohms Stability: (+/-) 100 ppm Spectral Purity: Harmonics Down >- TBD dB beyond 60MHz Step Size: User configurable increments of 100Hz, 1KHz, 10KHz, and 100KHz Usable Measurement Range: SWR: 1.0 to 9.99 Impedance: Approx. 5 to 2000 ohms RF Output: Adjustable: 2.0 Volts pp (typ) RF Out: BNC Connectors: RF Power Supply(NOT Included): Powered by External: DC 12-14V, 500mA External Power: 2.1mm Power Jack (center pin positive) USB Interface: Mini USB Receptacle Item Size: 14.8 * 8.7 * 3.3cm / 5.83 * 3.43 * 1.3in (L * W * H) Item Weight: 536g / 18.91oz
Package List: 1 * ANT SWR Antenna Analyzer English User Manual: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z2t3t73lwpsq3ha/SARK100%20User%20Manual.pdf?dl=0 Software Installation: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wl7vvd2gobm4xaf/WinPCC-Sark100%20EN%20V0.8.exe?dl=0

━━━━🌟 Frequently Asked Questions 🌟━━━━
Q: What is the fetal heart? A: The fetal heart refers to the heartbeat of the fetus, a rhythmic sound like a small train. The normal fetal heart rate range is 110-160 beats / min.
Q: The importance of fetal family monitoring? A: Fetal hypoxia (intrauterine distress and umbilical cord around the neck and other symptoms will affect the normal development of the fetus, and even endanger the life of the fetus and mother, these symptoms will be manifested in abnormal changes in fetal heart rate, 25% of pregnant women have this phenomenon.)
Q: How to use the ultrasonic fetal doppler? A: Please smear the Ultrasound Gel to the probe when using. If there is no Ultrasound Gel, you can replace it with water or edible oil. Place the probe directly on the abdomen of the pregnant woman to find the position of the fetal heart.

Using it to convert the multi-kind net voltage into general output under which all the electronic equipment are in safe operation. This STEP UP and DOWN Transformer can convert 220V and vice versa. It has precise input voltage selector which you can select(220Volts depending on the voltage source available)via selector switch located at the back of the unit. Specifications: Type: 200W Input Voltage: AC 220V Output Voltage: AC 220V Item Weight: 1450g / 3.2lb Package Weight: 1650g / 3.6lb Item Size: 139 * 110 * 91mm / 5.5 * 4.3 * 3.6in Package Size: 213 * 153 * 142mm / 8.4 * 6.0 * 5.6in Operating Instruction: Step Up and Down Transformer unit should be placed in a dry and well ventilated area at all times. Step Up and Down Transformer have an input voltage selector located at the back of the unit wherein the user can select either 220Volts depending on the available rated voltage source. For appliances with inductive load, such as refrigerators, mini are condition, industrial fan, etc. It is recommended to use a transformer that has rated power capacity of 3 to 5 times of the load power because the start up current of these appliances are vary high. For capacitive load, just leave enough allowance on the rated power capacity of the unit to avert overloading. Check your appliances for the rated power consumptions to avert overloading the unit. Low battery:when the battery is low the unit will shut down automatically indicated by four long pulses or without any vibration Applications: 1* unique sealed design allows detecting in any evirenment including grass ,mud ,dirt ,sand, or even in fresh or salt water ta a depth of 100 feet .Great for divers . 2* Public security check, Police investigation, Diving searching, Professional archaeology, Waste Iron Recovery ,Needle/pin 3* Search Coil Design Pinpointer ,Expand the detecting distance .
Product Feature : 1. Communicates with vibration & light - (When a target is located the Vibra-iking750 signals with pulses of vibration and flashes of bright from white L.E.D ) 2. Pulse Induction Technology (PI) - (Allows hunting in salt water or in any type of soil, including black sand) 3. Detection depth stability - (New Advanced circuitry maintains detection distance throughout the life of the battery) 4. Target distancing - (The pulses of vibration increase in frequency as the probe approaches the target precision pinpointing) 5. Automatic tuning - (The state of the art microprocessor controlled design requires no adjustments of any kind) 6. Waterproof - (Fully waterprooof for 30 meters underwater . Best for seaking treasure undersea ) 7. Belt ring & wrist strap - (Includes a belt ring to attach to any common belt clip as well as a wrist strap for added security) 8. Pulse induction search coil - wider detecting distance ,high sensitivity ,even seak one tiny needle 10. Soild construction - locate target easily in sand ,fresh and salt water 11. Seeking treasure undersea - white LED indiction ,virbrate indication 12. Search coil - Design pinpionter ,better detecting area & depth
Battery Installation : 1. Rotate the knob counter--clockwise to open the battery compartment seal 2. Insert 1 9V battery 3. Turn the knob clockwise until hand tight to assure a water-tight seal Note : Before submering the machine ,make sure the battery compartment seal is secure

entry.g:title: 220V 18L Retort machine Stainless Steam Autoclave Sterilizer Medical Steam Sterilizer Stainless Steel Dual Heating
entry.g:description:
"Package Included: 1x Steam Sterilizer 1x Power Cord Note: We not provide English usage manual.
Specifications: Product Name: Medical Steam Sterilizer Model: XFS-280A Sterilizing Volume: 18L Whole Size: About 35 x 28 x 45cm Power: 220V/50Hz Output Power: 2.0KW Overpressure Auto-discharging:0.145-0.165Mpa Range Of Measurement: Max. 121°C-128°C Plug: AU Plug Material: Stainless Steel Color: Silver Dimensions: 320x280x260mm
Operation: Step 1.Place the sterilizer on a flat surface. Step 2.Open the lid, take out the inner tank of sterilizer (you can see the heating electric tube),add water to the heating tube above 3.5L, you must add enough water in time to burning the electric tube due to lacking of water. Step 3.Put those items need to sterilize into the sterilization room, you should keep gaps between the items. Do not block steam holes of the safety valve, air releasing valve, and finally cover the lid, tighten the screws. Step 4. After the normal operation of the equipment, when the measured temperature reaches for 105 degrees, open the air releasing valve to discharge cold air inside the sterilizer. When the air releasing valve start going out a little hot steam, close the air releasing valve. Step 5. When the steam pressure reaches 0.142-0.165MPa , the safety valve will start pressure relief work, in order to maintain a certain pressure. Step 6. After sterilization, unplug the power cord. 3 minutes later, open the air releasing valve, when the pressure gauges to zero, open the lid to discharge the remaining air.
Safety Measure and Maintenance 1. This sterilizer is steam pressure vessel so do not impact in using and forbid overpressure. If the pressure pointer of pressure gauge reaches the 0.165MPa and the safety valve does not exhaust, it should stop using at once and check up the safety valve. 2. The pointer should be at zero position before usage the pressure gauge, otherwise the gauge has been failure and it should repair or replace the gauge. The pressure gauge should be regulated 1~2 times per year, ensuring sensitiveness and correctness. 3.Gasket is easy to wear. If it does not wok well, see it whether become aging and hard, then replace it in time."

entry.g:description:
S / M / L Orthotic Leg Prosthetic Cosmetic Foam Kaki kaki Prosthetic Foam Cosmetic

Berat: 350g Bahan: EVA
>>>>>>>> Apakah EVA Foam ??? Penerangan
EVA泡棉的优点： EVA橡塑制品是新型环保塑料包装材料，具有良好的缓冲、抗震、隔热、防潮、抗化学腐蚀等优点，且无毒、不吸水。 EVA橡塑制品经设计可加工成形，其防震性能优于聚苯乙烯（泡沫）等传统包装材料，且符合环保要求，是出口产品的最佳选择。相对于防震包装可以切割、成型；因密度差异较大，还可以有更为广泛的用途。 EVA泡棉材料的特点： a、耐水性：密闭泡孔结构，不吸水，防潮，耐水性能良好。 b、耐腐性：耐海水、油脂、酸、碱等化学品腐蚀，抗菌、无毒、无味、无污染。 c、加工性：且易于进行热压、剪裁、涂胶、贴合等加工。 d、防震动：回弹性和抗张力高，韧性强，具有良好的防震/缓冲性能。 e、保温性：隔热，保温防寒及低温性能优异，可耐严寒和曝晒。 f、隔音性：密闭泡孔，隔音效果好。 Busa EVA adalah sejenis bahan baru yang mesra alam yang dimiliki oleh produk busa, dan juga dikenali sebagai sponge EVA. Busa EVA juga boleh dihasilkan sesuai dengan keperluan pelanggan akan warna yang diperlukan, dengan bahan titik A, bahan B, material C, bahan perlindungan alam sekitar rasa rendah dan bahan perlindungan alam sekitar. EVA berbuih proses: Pada suhu penguraian, ejen berbuih melepaskan sejumlah besar gas untuk membentuk inti.Setelah pelepasan tekanan tiba-tiba, tekanan penyahmampatan teras menyebabkan EVA dan bahan lain membengkak dan membentuk bahan berbuih. Bahan busa buih Kelas EVA: Gred C, Gred B, Gred A, gred 3A, bahan CR, bahan keanjalan EVA yang tinggi, serta bahan getah EVA. Ini sering digunakan dalam lapisan kotak alat dan kotak, dan sering digunakan dalam produk kraf mainan mesra alam. Kelebihan busa EVA: EVA getah dan produk plastik adalah jenis baru dari bahan bungkusan plastik yang mesra alam, dengan penampan yang baik, seismik, haba, kelembapan, ketahanan kimia, dll, dan tidak beracun, tidak menyerap. Produk getah dan plastik EVA direka untuk diproses dan dibentuk. Prestasi shockproof mereka lebih baik daripada bahan pembungkusan tradisional seperti polistirena (buih) dan memenuhi keperluan perlindungan alam sekitar. Ini adalah pilihan terbaik untuk produk eksport. Berbanding dengan pembungkusan shockproof, ia boleh dipotong dan berbentuk, kerana perbezaan ketumpatan yang besar, ia juga boleh digunakan secara meluas. Ciri-ciri ciri busa EVA: a, kalis air: struktur sel tertutup, bukan penyerap, kelembapan-bukti, rintangan air yang baik. b. Ketahanan kakisan: Tahan terhadap air laut, minyak, asid, alkali dan bahan kimia lain, antibakteria, tidak toksik, tidak berbau, tidak ada pencemaran. c, pemprosesan: dan mudah untuk menekan haba, potong, kot, mengikat dan pemprosesan lain. d, getaran anti: Ketahanan dan voltan tinggi, ketahanan, dengan prestasi kejutan / buffer yang baik. e, penebat: penebat, penebat, suhu sejuk dan prestasi rendah, boleh menahan sejuk dan pendedahan. f, penebat bunyi: sel tertutup, penebat bunyi adalah baik. What is Club Foot?
Club foot (also called talipes equinovarus or dennis brown) is a general term used to describe a range of unusual positions of the foot. Each of the following characteristics can be present, and each can vary from mild to severe:
* The foot is generally smaller than normal foot. * The foot may point downward. * The front of the foot may be rotated toward the other foot. * The foot may turn in, and in extreme cases, the bottom of the foot can point up.
Most types of clubfoot are present at birth (congenital clubfoot). Clubfoot can happen in one foot or in both feet. In almost half of affected infants, both feet are involved.
Also clubfoot is painless in a baby, treatment should begin immediately. Clubfoot can cause significant problems as the child grows. But with early treatment most children born with clubfoot are able to lead a normal life. Contact your doctor urgently If your baby have it.
We recommend you to visit our page about Club Foot for all the questions about club foot foot disease that you can find on our page and you can find detailed information about the dennis brown boot and bar which is an important part of Club Foot treatment.
